entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:42 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 11:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -34.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -37.4°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:41 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 43 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 43 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 55 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:41 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 46.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 46. Wind chill minus 55 in the evening and minus 63 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:41 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
